name: SteamTrains Complete
description:
SteamTrains is a fun new app for kids aged from 3- 12.

Small kids can watch the trains race around the railroad and move the viewport around the trains to see them from all angles.
Its all made in 3D so you can see everything from all angles. Its just like playing with the real thing !

You can drive them forwards and backwards and choose different paths for them!

The SteamTrains have properly functioning wheel mechanisms and can race around the scenic landscape at high speed. It can all be viewed from different positions just by clicking the camera button.
